entry.title: Changing PGP identities/keys
entry.summary: The message is from Jeff Garzik who is switching to jgarzik at bitpay.com as a PGP identity with brand new signing keys. The message provides two links for verification and requests people to confirm his identity via a sig check and IRC ack. Bitcoin.org will be updated after the switch. The message includes Jeff Garzik's business identity and PGP information and is signed by his exmulti.com key.
